tool_description: Detects anomalous patterns in HVAC system performance by comparing current readings against established baselines and identifying deviations that indicate potential issues.

current_readings.description: Current system readings to analyze for anomalies

baseline_upper.description: Upper threshold values for normal operation

baseline_lower.description: Lower threshold values for normal operation

sensitivity.description: Anomaly detection sensitivity: low, medium, high

pattern_window.description: Number of consecutive readings to consider for pattern detection (3-50)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: current_readings, baseline_upper, and baseline_lower must have the same length.
Invalid sensitivity level: Use one of [low, medium, high].
Pattern window out of range: Value must be between 3 and 50.
Invalid threshold values: baseline_upper values must be greater than corresponding baseline_lower values.
usage: Provide current_readings with corresponding baseline_upper and baseline_lower arrays. Optionally set sensitivity and pattern_window. Returns detected anomalies and their severity.

anomaly_indices.description: Indices of readings that are anomalous

severity_levels.description: Severity level for each anomaly: minor, moderate, severe, critical

pattern_type.description: Detected pattern type: spike, drift, oscillation, step_change, none
